data.title: Aaron Diaz biography, net worth, partner, baby, tv shows • biography
data.meta_description: Aaron Diaz  biography, net worth, partner, baby, tv shows | Aaron Diaz Spencer is a Mexican singer model Aaron also does acting Born in 1982 in Puerto Vallarta Jalisco Mexico he speaks English as well as Spanish fluently
data.text:
Early Life and Education

Aaron was born in Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco, Mexico. He speaks Spanish as well as English with equal dexterity. He spent several years in Palo, Alto in California. He completed high school in Palo, Alto in California. He then studied at the Televisa acting school in Mexico.

Career

Aaron performed in a number of important roles in his acting career. He made his acting debut in the teen drama Clase 406 that became very popular. Following these, he got a number of acting offers that he signed. Besides an actor, Aaron had other interests. In 2008, he debuted as an entrepreneur and designer with the clothing brand Perra.

Diaz as a singer performed in several albums. His first album was released in 2009. The second album was released in 2011. In 2010 and 2011 he has done a number of TV shows. The fascinating thing is that in most of the projects where he worked, he played either as protagonist or a side role. But in his career, in the telenovela, El Talisman, Aaron appeared in a villainous role.

Personal Life

Other important aspects of Aaron’s biography are his love life. He dated and eventually and married actress Kate Del Castillo in 2009. But their relationship did not last long and ended in an estrangement that occurred in 2011. After that, Aaron started dating Lola Ponce in 2012. Lola Ponce is the co-star of Diaz in El Talisman. They wedded in 2015. Both Aaron and his partner have two baby daughters Erin and Regina.

Net Worth

The net worth of Aaron Diaz is estimated to be around $6,000,000. The annual salary of the multi-faced personality, Aaron $705,882. Diaz is quite popular among his fans. He has done a number of successful TV shows that helped him achieve this popularity.

Television Shows

Diaz has been quite successful so far as performing in TV shows is concerned. The celebrity has performed in a number of television shows with dexterity and that helped him achieve popularity among his fans and followers. Among the important projects that he undertook in his career are Clase 406, Corazones al limite, Barrera de amor, Plaza Sesamo, Lola, Terminales, Dinoshark, Pan Am, El Talisman, Rosario, Santa Diabla, Los miserables, Tierra de reyes, etc.

Films

Apart from performing in TV shows, Diaz did a couple of films. In 2006, he made his acting debut with Amor xtremo and in 2012 he appeared in a film titled Marcelo.
